content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not generating power due to being disconnected from the power network and lacking input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is currently not engaged in any research.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of an assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is not receiving electricity and cannot create automation-science-pack due to missing resources.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when steam engine is not generating power
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network and has a source of water to operate.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- The second argument must be an Entity or EntityGroup. Ensure you are passing the correct entity reference instead of a position when attempting to insert items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
